scripts.dev: LOG_LEVEL=trace DEBUG=* NODE_OPTIONS="--enable-source-maps --experimental-specifier-resolution=node" tsx watch --clear-screen=false src/index.ts
scripts.dev:debug: LOG_LEVEL=trace DEBUG=* NODE_OPTIONS="--enable-source-maps --experimental-specifier-resolution=node" tsx watch --inspect=0.0.0.0:9229 --clear-screen=false src/index.ts
scripts.stop: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const f='.server.pid';if(!fs.existsSync(f)){console.error('No .server.pid found. Is the server running?');process.exit(1)}const pid=Number(fs.readFileSync(f,'utf8').trim());if(!pid){console.error('Invalid PID in .server.pid');process.exit(1)}try{process.kill(pid,'SIGTERM');console.log('Sent SIGTERM to PID',pid);}catch(e){console.error('Failed to signal process',e);process.exit(1)}"
scripts.env:test: NODE_ENV=test node scripts/generate-env.mjs --out .env.test --set PORT=3333 --set STORAGE_ADAPTER=memory --set SQLITE_DB_PATH=./data/inventory.test.db --set NODE_ENV=test
